mapper.select: select * from project.tblrecruit where bno in (select rcbno from project.tblinterestjob where userid = #{id}) order by bno;

select rc.bno, rc.title, rc.regdate, rc.period , (select cname from tblcinfo where id = rc.cid) recruitform , (select count(*) from tblapply where rcno = rc.bno group by rcno) addesc , (select title from tblresume where bno in (select rsno from tblapply where rcno = rc.bno ) and userid=#{id}) acceptmethod , (select rsno from tblapply where rcno = rc.bno and pid = #{id}) viewcnt from tblrecruit rc where rc.bno in( select bno from tblrecruit where bno in (select rcno from tblapply where rsno in ( select bno from tblresume where userid=#{id})));
